name: Woo Service Plan
author: kirtikanani

sections.description:
WooCommerce Service Plan is add more features in your site for product Service Plan in WooCommerce cart Page

Help Documentation for Paid version

Features

  • This plugin is use to Give Service To your Product Buyer
  • This plugin Work With woocommerce
  • This plugin is provide Able to add service Plan for Same Service Plain For all Product and also Separately Service Base on Product
  • This Plugin Fully Dynamical So you set your service Plan free and Paid

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

    1. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

    2. After go on Lefthend==>WooCommerce==>==>Settings==>click on( Service Plan)
      Help Documentation
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
